application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 22/02258/FUL: potable water (4), energy statement (5), SuDS (7), refuse and recycling storage (8), hard and soft landscaping (9), enclosure (10), biodiversity enhancements (11) and solar PV panels (14) in respect of sub-division of site and erection of an end-of-terraced 2-storey dwelling house.
decision_conditions: The information submitted in respect of discharging conditions 7 is considered insufficient and inadequate as it fails to demonstrate that on site infiltration testing has been carried out to support the use of the proposed soakaway in order to ensure the runoff will be able to drain away sufficiently. Therefore, the proposal is contrary to Policy CP28 of the Core Strategy, Development Management Document Policy 61, Policies SI 12 & SI 13 of the London Plan and the NPPF (2024).
